Class ToolKit

java.lang.Object
  ToolKit

public class ToolKit
extends java.lang.Object

Contains a number of methods useful for debugging and developing programs using Bencoding methods.  This class is specifically designed to be used with edu.rutgers.cs.cs352.bt.util.Bencoder and Bencoder2.

Author:
Robert S. Moore II
